Title: Otello
Writer: Arrigo Boito (libretto), Franco Zeffirelli (adaptation), Masolino D'Amico (adapted for the screen by)
Actors: Plácido Domingo, Katia Ricciarelli, Justino Díaz, Petra Malakova
Plot: Based on Shakespeare's play, Verdi's opera depicts the devastating effects of jealousy, "...the green-eyed monster which doth mock the meat it feeds upon". Believing Otello has promoted the...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 6 nominations.
